FOUND IN: Mourning - expressing deep sadness or lamentation, typically at the loss of a loved one.
Black-legged Kittiwake - Numerous small, slate-gray gull with a black band across the lower legs and long wingspan.
Asleep - In a state of rest, typically characterized by reduced consciousness and inactivity.
Cob - The central part of an ear of corn, made up of many rows of kernels.

FOUND IN: Paso Doble - Inspired by Spanish bullfighting, with dramatic poses and strong beats.
